page.title: 02YOXALL VILLAGE (continued)
page.content: Conveniently placed for Burton on Trent and Lichfield,Yoxall has become a favoured place of residence for people who wish to live in the country yet be within travelling distance of their place of work. eg _Birmingham,Stafford or the Potteries. Population details according to the 1981 census are as follows _ Total population of Yoxall 1,550 Males 774 Females 776 Number of Households 540 Owner occupied house 472 Council owned houses 36 Households without a car 71 Total number of cars 699
